tags: or maybe it's just an illusion?
regular-body:
verylittlebird:

a magician asks you to pick a card - any card, in fact. you do. they ask you to put the card back in the pack - anywhere in the pack, in fact. you do. they walk away. ten years later, your wife gives birth to the six of clubs. âis this your card?â the midwife asks, in a familiar voice.
